name: strident
content:
strident adjective
(LOUD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A strident sound is loud, unpleasant, and rough: People are put off by his strident voice.

strident adjective
(FORCEFUL)
expressing or expressed in forceful language that does not try to avoid upsetting other people: a strident newspaper article They are becoming increasingly strident in their criticism of government economic policy.
